column4: If I make a backup with clonezilla, put it on a flash drive then move it to another computer, can I then restore it after putting it back on the USB drive?
not sure what you mean by "after putting it back on the USB drive" but clonezilla does work. Of course its sometimes a god idea to practice with it.
say I delete the image from usb to free space on usb, then put the image back, can clonezilla still restore it?
oh, you are coping the image somewhere else?
